awakenings.effect: When HP is below 50%: Damage taken reduced by 10%.
[Skills] and [Normal Attack] level and level cap +4.
When HP is below 50%: All damage ignores 20% elemental resistance.

effects: When HP is below 50%: All damage increased by 40%
memoryCard.name: The World Seems to Have Stopped

auto.description: Automatically deals 240% attack power as wind damage to designated enemy and nearby enemies. Each hit restores 10% max HP.
auto.name: Moon Ancient Boxing

normal.description: Deals 120% attack power as wind damage to designated enemy unit.
normal.name: Moon Rising Fist

passive.description: When HP is below 50%: All attacks deal additional 60% attack power as wind damage.
passive.name: Moon Shadow Hunt

ultimate.description: Consumes 50% current HP. Teleports in front of designated enemy. Deals 264% attack power as wind damage to target and nearby enemies.
ultimate.name: Silver Moon Judgment

teamSkill.description: Self max HP increased by 10%. At battle start: For every 4,000 max HP, increase self attack power by 5% (maximum 6 times). Maximum scaling: 30% attack power boost at 24,000+ max HP.
teamSkill.name: Combination Skill
